item.title: Shop-Donator Problem, PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @rayallan11 rayallan11
item.description:
@rayallan11 wrote:

When I first downloaded my source, there were tons of shops in Edgeville, and none anywhere else.
So, I deleted them, and thought I would add one.
I added a general shop, but I found out that the previous shop id (1), was a donator shop,
and you have to buy the items in shopid1 with donator points instead of coins.
I don’t know how to fix this, and everytime I get a 100 errors:

if (MyShopID == 1) {
                    if (dpoints >= TotPrice2) {
                        if (freeSlots() > 0) {
                            dpoints -= TotPrice2;
                            addItem(itemID, 1);
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
                            server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                            if ((fromSlot + 1)
                                    > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
                                server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
                            }
                        } else {
                            sM("Not enough space in your inventory.");
                            break;
                        }
                    } else {
                        sM("You do not have enough Donator Points for this item.");
                    }
      updatePKP();
                }            
            }
            resetItems(3823);
            resetShop(MyShopID);
            UpdatePlayerShop();
            return true;
        }

Its a 317 server. Please help!

Read full topic
